element.comments: The precinct in which the incident occurred
element.label: ADDR_PCT_CD
element.name: addr_pct_cd

element.comments: The name of the borough in which the incident occurred
element.label: BORO
element.name: boro

element.comments: Exact date of occurrence for the reported event (or starting date of occurrence, if CMPLNT_TO_DT exists)
element.label: CMPLNT_FR_DT
element.name: cmplnt_fr_dt

element.comments: Randomly generated persistent ID for each complaint
element.label: CMPLNT_NUM
element.name: cmplnt_num

element.comments: Indicator of whether crime was successfully completed or attempted, but failed or was interrupted prematurely
element.label: CRM_ATPT_CPTD_CD
element.name: crm_atpt_cptd_cd

element.comments: Name of NYCHA housing development of occurrence, if applicable
element.label: HADEVELOPT
element.name: hadevelopt

element.comments: Jurisdiction responsible for incident. Either internal, like Police(0), Transit(1), and Housing(2); or external(3), like Correction, Port Authority, etc.
element.label: JURISDICTION_CODE
element.name: jurisdiction_code

element.comments: Midblock Latitude coordinate for Global Coordinate System, WGS 1984, decimal degrees (EPSG 4326)
element.label: Latitude
element.name: latitude

element.comments: Midblock Longitude coordinate for Global Coordinate System, WGS 1984, decimal degrees (EPSG 4326)
element.label: Longitude
element.name: longitude

element.comments: Name of NYC park, playground or greenspace of occurrence, if applicable (state parks are not included)
element.label: PARKS_NM
element.name: parks_nm

element.comments: Specific description of premises; grocery store, residence, street, etc.
element.label: PREM_TYP_DESC
element.name: prem_typ_desc
